dataSet.name: DataSet1
dataSet.query:
SELECT ALLOWED AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.Account AS AccountInventory, AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountOpeningBalanceDr AS InventoryNG, AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountClosingBalanceDr AS Inventory, AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.Company FROM AccountingRegister.Managerial.BalanceAndTurnovers( , , , , Account.TypeOfAccount = VALUE(Enum.GLAccountsTypes.Inventory) OR Account.TypeOfAccount = VALUE(Enum.GLAccountsTypes.UnfinishedProduction), PlanningPeriod = VALUE(Catalog.PlanningPeriods.Actual) AND (Company = &Company OR &Company = VALUE(Catalog.Companies.EmptyRef))) AS AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers
UNION ALL
SELECT AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.Account, -1 * AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountOpeningBalanceCr, -1 * AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountClosingBalanceCr, AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.Company FROM AccountingRegister.Managerial.BalanceAndTurnovers( , , , , Account.TypeOfAccount = VALUE(Enum.GLAccountsTypes.TradeMarkup), PlanningPeriod = VALUE(Catalog.PlanningPeriods.Actual) AND (Company = &Company OR &Company = VALUE(Catalog.Companies.EmptyRef))) AS AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers

dataSet.name: DataSet2
dataSet.query: SELECT ALLOWED AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.Account AS AccountDebitors, AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountOpeningBalanceDr AS DebitorsNG, AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountClosingBalanceDr AS Debitors, AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.Company FROM AccountingRegister.Managerial.BalanceAndTurnovers( , , , , Account.TypeOfAccount = VALUE(Enum.GLAccountsTypes.Debitors), PlanningPeriod = VALUE(Catalog.PlanningPeriods.Actual) AND (Company = &Company OR &Company = VALUE(Catalog.Companies.EmptyRef))) AS AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers

dataSet.name: DataSet3
dataSet.query: SELECT ALLOWED AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.Account AS AccountCashAssets, AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountOpeningBalanceDr AS CashAssetsNG, AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountClosingBalanceDr AS CashAssets, AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.Company FROM AccountingRegister.Managerial.BalanceAndTurnovers( , , , , Account.TypeOfAccount = VALUE(Enum.GLAccountsTypes.CashAssets), PlanningPeriod = VALUE(Catalog.PlanningPeriods.Actual) AND (Company = &Company OR &Company = VALUE(Catalog.Companies.EmptyRef))) AS AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers

dataSet.name: DataSet4
dataSet.query: SELECT ALLOWED AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.Account AS AccountCreditors, AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountOpeningBalanceCr AS CreditorsNG, AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountClosingBalanceCr AS Creditors, AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.Company FROM AccountingRegister.Managerial.BalanceAndTurnovers( , , , , Account.TypeOfAccount = VALUE(Enum.GLAccountsTypes.Creditors), PlanningPeriod = VALUE(Catalog.PlanningPeriods.Actual) AND (Company = &Company OR &Company = VALUE(Catalog.Companies.EmptyRef))) AS AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers

dataSet.name: DataSet5

v8:item.v8:content: Non-allocated profit products and services groups

dataSet.query: SELECT ALLOWED CASE WHEN AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.Account.TypeOfAccount = VALUE(Enum.GLAccountsTypes.FixedAssets) THEN AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountClosingBalanceDr WHEN AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.Account.TypeOfAccount = VALUE(Enum.GLAccountsTypes.DepreciationFixedAssets) THEN -1 * AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountClosingBalanceCr ELSE 0 END AS FixedAssets, CASE WHEN AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.Account.TypeOfAccount = VALUE(Enum.GLAccountsTypes.FixedAssets) THEN AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountOpeningBalanceDr WHEN AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.Account.TypeOfAccount = VALUE(Enum.GLAccountsTypes.DepreciationFixedAssets) THEN -1 * AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountOpeningBalanceCr ELSE 0 END AS FixedAssetsNG, CASE WHEN AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.Account.TypeOfAccount = VALUE(Enum.GLAccountsTypes.OtherFixedAssets) THEN AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountClosingBalanceDr ELSE 0 END AS OtherFixedAssets, CASE WHEN AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.Account.TypeOfAccount = VALUE(Enum.GLAccountsTypes.OtherFixedAssets) THEN AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountOpeningBalanceDr ELSE 0 END AS OtherFixedAssetsNG, CASE WHEN AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.Account.TypeOfAccount = VALUE(Enum.GLAccountsTypes.Inventory) OR AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.Account.TypeOfAccount = VALUE(Enum.GLAccountsTypes.UnfinishedProduction) THEN AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountClosingBalanceDr WHEN AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.Account.TypeOfAccount = VALUE(Enum.GLAccountsTypes.TradeMarkup) THEN -1 * AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountClosingBalanceCr ELSE 0 END AS InventoryTotal, CASE WHEN AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.Account.TypeOfAccount = VALUE(Enum.GLAccountsTypes.Inventory) OR AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.Account.TypeOfAccount = VALUE(Enum.GLAccountsTypes.UnfinishedProduction) THEN AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountOpeningBalanceDr WHEN AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.Account.TypeOfAccount = VALUE(Enum.GLAccountsTypes.TradeMarkup) THEN -1 * AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountOpeningBalanceCr ELSE 0 END AS InventoryTotalNG, CASE WHEN AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.Account.TypeOfAccount = VALUE(Enum.GLAccountsTypes.Debitors) THEN AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountClosingBalanceDr ELSE 0 END AS DebitorsTotal, CASE WHEN AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.Account.TypeOfAccount = VALUE(Enum.GLAccountsTypes.Debitors) THEN AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountOpeningBalanceDr ELSE 0 END AS DebitorsTotalNG, CASE WHEN AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.Account.TypeOfAccount = VALUE(Enum.GLAccountsTypes.CashAssets) THEN AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountClosingBalanceDr ELSE 0 END AS CashAssetsTotal, CASE WHEN AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.Account.TypeOfAccount = VALUE(Enum.GLAccountsTypes.CashAssets) THEN AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountOpeningBalanceDr ELSE 0 END AS CashAssetsTotalNG, CASE WHEN AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.Account.TypeOfAccount = VALUE(Enum.GLAccountsTypes.ShorttermInvestments) THEN AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountClosingBalanceDr ELSE 0 END AS ShorttermInvestments, CASE WHEN AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.Account.TypeOfAccount = VALUE(Enum.GLAccountsTypes.ShorttermInvestments) THEN AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountOpeningBalanceDr ELSE 0 END AS ShorttermInvestmentsNG, CASE WHEN AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.Account.TypeOfAccount = VALUE(Enum.GLAccountsTypes.OtherCurrentAssets) THEN AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountClosingBalanceDr ELSE 0 END AS OtherCurrentAssets, CASE WHEN AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.Account.TypeOfAccount = VALUE(Enum.GLAccountsTypes.OtherCurrentAssets) THEN AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountOpeningBalanceDr ELSE 0 END AS OtherCurrentAssetsNG, CASE WHEN AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.Account.TypeOfAccount = VALUE(Enum.GLAccountsTypes.Capital) THEN AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountClosingBalanceCr ELSE 0 END AS Capital, CASE WHEN AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.Account.TypeOfAccount = VALUE(Enum.GLAccountsTypes.Capital) THEN AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountOpeningBalanceCr ELSE 0 END AS CapitalNG, CASE WHEN AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.Account.TypeOfAccount = VALUE(Enum.GLAccountsTypes.ReserveAndAdditionalCapital) THEN AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountClosingBalanceCr ELSE 0 END AS ReserveAdditionalCapital, CASE WHEN AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.Account.TypeOfAccount = VALUE(Enum.GLAccountsTypes.ReserveAndAdditionalCapital) THEN AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountOpeningBalanceCr ELSE 0 END AS ReserveAdditionalCapitalNG, CASE WHEN AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.Account.TypeOfAccount = VALUE(Enum.GLAccountsTypes.UndistributedProfit) OR AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.Account.TypeOfAccount = VALUE(Enum.GLAccountsTypes.ProfitTax) OR AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.Account.TypeOfAccount = VALUE(Enum.GLAccountsTypes.ProfitLosses) THEN AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountClosingBalanceCr - AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountClosingBalanceDr ELSE 0 END AS UndistributedProfit, CASE WHEN AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.Account.TypeOfAccount = VALUE(Enum.GLAccountsTypes.UndistributedProfit) OR AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.Account.TypeOfAccount = VALUE(Enum.GLAccountsTypes.ProfitTax) OR AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.Account.TypeOfAccount = VALUE(Enum.GLAccountsTypes.ProfitLosses) THEN AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountOpeningBalanceCr - AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountOpeningBalanceDr ELSE 0 END AS UndistributedProfitNG, CASE WHEN AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.Account.TypeOfAccount = VALUE(Enum.GLAccountsTypes.LongtermObligations) THEN AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountClosingBalanceCr ELSE 0 END AS LongtermObligations, CASE WHEN AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.Account.TypeOfAccount = VALUE(Enum.GLAccountsTypes.LongtermObligations) THEN AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountOpeningBalanceCr ELSE 0 END AS LongtermObligationsNG, CASE WHEN AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.Account.TypeOfAccount = VALUE(Enum.GLAccountsTypes.CreditsAndLoans) THEN AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountClosingBalanceCr ELSE 0 END AS LoansCredits, CASE WHEN AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.Account.TypeOfAccount = VALUE(Enum.GLAccountsTypes.CreditsAndLoans) THEN AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountOpeningBalanceCr ELSE 0 END AS LoansCreditsNG, CASE WHEN AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.Account.TypeOfAccount = VALUE(Enum.GLAccountsTypes.Creditors) THEN AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountClosingBalanceCr ELSE 0 END AS CreditorsTotal, CASE WHEN AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.Account.TypeOfAccount = VALUE(Enum.GLAccountsTypes.Creditors) THEN AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountOpeningBalanceCr ELSE 0 END AS CreditorsTotalNG, CASE WHEN AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.Account.TypeOfAccount = VALUE(Enum.GLAccountsTypes.OtherShorttermObligations) THEN AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountClosingBalanceCr ELSE 0 END AS OtherShorttermObligations, CASE WHEN AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.Account.TypeOfAccount = VALUE(Enum.GLAccountsTypes.OtherShorttermObligations) THEN AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountOpeningBalanceCr ELSE 0 END AS OtherShortTermObligationsNG, 0 AS Total1NG, 0 AS Total1, 0 AS Total2NG, 0 AS Total2, 0 AS Total12NG, 0 AS Total12, 0 AS Total3NG, 0 AS Total3, 0 AS Total4NG, 0 AS Total4, 0 AS Total5NG, 0 AS Total5, 0 AS Total345NG, 0 AS Total345, AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.Company FROM AccountingRegister.Managerial.BalanceAndTurnovers( , , , , , PlanningPeriod = VALUE(Catalog.PlanningPeriods.Actual) AND (Company = &Company OR &Company = VALUE(Catalog.Companies.EmptyRef))) AS AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers
